query: SELECT COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'tasks' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'status'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute SELECT COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'tasks' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'status'
